name: Deva
description: A radiant being with luminous wings and glowing skin, showcasing beauty and divine grace.
memorable: Exceptional resilience with resistance to radiant damage and the ability to heal and revive others.
goals: To guide, protect, or defend worthy mortals while battling evil forces.
relations: Often associated with other celestial beings and deities.
environment: Can be found in realms associated with goodness and divine beings.
strengths: High magical resistance and powerful healing abilities, alongside formidable combat skills.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to foes with strong resistance or immunity to magical damage.
attacks: Utilizes the Celestial Hammer for melee attacks and Divine Blast for ranged offense, dealing both bludgeoning and radiant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Healing Touch allows the restoration of significant hit points and removes various conditions.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 30 feet, enhancing its ability to perceive hidden or invisible creatures.
skills: Excels in Insight, Perception, and Religion, indicating deep wisdom and awareness.
additional_information: Magic Resistance offers advantage on saving throws against spells.
Can transform into a beast or humanoid form.
Immortal Nature means it does not require food, drink, or sleep.
Celestial Dissolution causes its body to dissolve into light upon death.
Reviving Prayer can return a creature to life within 24 hours.
spellcasting: Can innately cast spells like 'detect evil and good' at will and 'commune' and 'raise dead' once per day.
test_queries: angelic being with radiant wings and healing powers
powerful celestial creature known for divine grace
healer that uses radiant powers in combat
beautiful celestial that protects good souls
mighty angel that transforms into other forms
